name: BMCook: A Task-agnostic Compression Toolkit for Big Models (EMNLP 2022)
Sub-Character Tokenization for Chinese Pretrained Language Models (TACL 2023)
desc: A sub-character tokenization method that is more efficient and robust against noisy inputs, while maintaining competitive performance.

name: READIN: A Chinese Multi-Task Benchmark with Realistic and Diverse Input Noises (ACL 2023)
desc: A Chinese dataset with realistic noise that is produces by inputting text through ASR and IME systems.
